name: Icon
description: An accessible icon component with Lucide integration supporting decorative and meaningful icon usage

accessibility.screenReader: Decorative icons (no label) are hidden from screen readers. Meaningful icons (with label) are announced as images with the provided label.
knownLimitations: Icon-only interactive elements require additional accessible labeling

recommendedUsage: Use icons to enhance visual communication. Always provide a label for meaningful icons. Use without label for purely decorative icons.
antiPatterns: Do not use icons as the only means of conveying information. Avoid icon-only buttons without accessible labels. Do not use icons when text would be clearer.
